brand_selection.market_context: NOTE: Traditional Irish bookmakers (Boylesports, Paddy Power, Ladbrokes) have high search volumes but client-specified brands are international operators. Content should acknowledge Irish market leaders while featuring specified brands.

content_sections.requirements: Top 3 app picks, authority statement, affiliate disclosure
Interactive sortable table, ALL 10 brands, key metrics (rating, bonus, features)
600 words per brand Ã— 10 brands. Each brand must have: Key Features (150-200), Mobile Experience (100-150), Pros & Cons (100-150), Current Bonus (75-100)

iOS App Store guide, Android Google Play guide
Compare in-play betting interfaces across apps
10-12 FAQs targeting secondary keywords with schema markup
